title.en: Aspiration for the Spread of the Khyentse Tradition1

text.en: Master of the ocean of nonsectarian teachings in the Land of Snows,
text.en-trans: gang jong rimé tenpa gyatsö dak

text.en: Sovereign authority of the seven wondrous forms of transmission,2
text.en-trans: ngotsar kabab dün gyi khorlö gyur

text.en: Mañjughoṣa in person, Jamyang Khyentse Wangpo—
text.en-trans: jampé yang ngö khyentsé wangpo yi

text.en: May all be auspicious for your tradition and teachings to spread far and wide!
